features.title: Club Access

featureList.name: Club55 is open exclusively for Club Room, Grand Club Room, and Suites guests daily from 6.30am  7pm
Club55 access has been personalised for 2 guests per room/suite; additional guests are welcome to use all of our offerings at a supplementary fee. Children below 6years enjoy complimentary access
Guests enjoy complimentary daily beverages & canaps from 5pm  7pm, as well as complimentary daily afternoon tea and non-alcoholic beverages till closing
Use complimentary Wi-Fi and make local calls
International newspapers & magazines are provided for use
Use of Laptops, MacBooks and iPads are subject to availability
Exclusive access to Club55 & complimentary breakfast

contentList: Club55 is open exclusively for Club Room, Grand Club Room, and Suites guests daily from 6.30am  7pm

Use complimentary Wi-Fi and make local calls
International newspapers & magazines are provided for use
Use of Laptops, MacBooks and iPads are subject to availability
Exclusive access to Club55 & complimentary breakfast
